Name: NEO: Commanders
About the game: Admiral, take a seat in the commander's chair, a map of the star system spreads out in front of you, look at it and command your troops, occupy new territories and obtain much needed resources. In NEO: Commanders, you will become one of many space admirals who have the opportunity to show their command skills and compare them with other players. Become the master of strategic thinking and make your name known throughout the universe! Chose heroes you hire to lead your fleet to many victories. Only the best strategists will stand against the numbers of ruthless enemies. In game, you have the opportunity to place heroes on your ships who will then bring certain bonuses to those ships. Thanks to its 2D pixel environment, NEO: Commanders offers a simple but fun and unorthodox way of controlling your units, which takes place behind the battle plan in your commander's ship. Thanks to the possibility to choose your own fleet design, you have the opportunity to completely configure the individual units of the ships that you will send into battle. In NEO: Commanders, you will explore various battlefields in various corners of the wide universe, by supporting research you can gain better technology and give your units a strategic advantage, thanks to the experience gained, level your units and strengthen them in the next battle.
